SMB 2 Replay Format

Notes

  • The initial gamecube header is being skipped for now. See http://www.surugi.com/projects/gcifaq.html for the format. Replay data begins at 0x20A0

Sections

  • Data Section (Offset 0x20A0)

Flags

  • Ok to be left as null
  • Ok to be left as null if the number of objects is 0/referenced item is not set
  • 4 byte integer
  • 4 byte float
  • 2 byte short
  • 1 byte
  • 4 byte file offset
  • Unknown

Data Section (Offset 0x20A0)

Length: 0x20C0/8384

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x20A08352Ignore this (used to fix other offsets)
0x20A083520x44Float?
0x20A483560x22Difficulty
0x20A683580x22Stage ID (ex: 201 in hex)
0x20A883600x11Monkey
0x20A983610x11Unknown
0x20AA83620x11Difficulty
0x20AB83630x11Stage
0x20AC83640x22Score
0x20AE83660xD13Unknown
0x20BB83790x22Difficulty (Repeated?)
0x20BD83810x22Stage ID (ex: 201 in hex), (Repeated?)
0x20BF83830x11Monkey (Repeated?)
